info.title: SolarEdge
info.description: The SolarEdge connector gives you the oppurtunity to display system data in other applications

get.description: Returns a list of sites related to the given token, which is the account api_key. This API accepts parameters for convenient search, sort and pagination.

count.description: The amount of sites that are returned.

accountId.description: The account this site belongs to

lastUpdateTime.description: Site last update datetime, format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

installationDate.description: Site installation datetime, format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

location.description: Site location includes country, state, city, address, secondary address, time zone and zip

get.description: Displays the site details, such as name, location, status, etc.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

accountId.description: The account this site belongs to

installationDate.description: Site installation datetime, format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

location.description: Site location includes country, state, city, address, secondary address, time zone and zip

alertQuantity.description: Number of open alerts in this site

alertSeverity.description: The highest alert severity in this site

get.description: The response includes the site current power, daily energy, monthly energy, yearly energy and life time energy.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

get.description: Returns all environmental benefits based on site energy production: CO2 emissions saved, equivalent trees planted, and light bulbs powered for a day.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

units.description: units for the rest of the results

gasEmissionSaved.description: Quantity of CO2 emissions that would have been generated by an equivalent fossil fuel system

treesPlanted.description: Equivalent planting of new trees for reducing CO2 levels

lightBulbs.description: number of light bulbs that could have been powered by the site for a day

get.description: Return the inventory of SolarEdge equipment in the site, including inverters/SMIs, batteries, meters, gateways and sensors.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

connectedSolaredgeDeviceSN.description: – Name of SolarEdge device the meter is connected to

form.description: physical for a HW meter or virtual if calculated by arithmetic between other meters

meters.description: List of meters for specified site

connectedSolaredgeDeviceSN.description: – Name of SolarEdge device the sensor is connected to

connectedTo.description: name of the device it is connected to e.g. "Gateway 1"

type.description: Sensor type e.g. “Plane of array irradiance”

sensors.description: List of sensors for specified site

gateways.description: List of gateways for specified site

connectedInverterSn.description: – serial number of the inverter / gateway the battery is connected to

nameplateCapacity.description: the nameplate capacity of the battery as provided by the manufacturer

batteries.description: List of batteries for specified site

connectedOptimizers.description: Number of optimizers connected to the inverter

inverters.description: List of inverters for specified site

get.description: Return the site power measurements in 15 minutes resolution

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start date and time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) to get power measurements

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The start date and time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) to get power measurements

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

value.description: Measured power(i.e. Watt) at specified datetime

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Aggregation granularity, allowed values are QUARTER_OF_AN_HOUR, HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date to return energy measurement
parameters.x-ms-summary: The start date to return energy measurement

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date return energy measurement
parameters.x-ms-summary: The end date return energy measurement

value.description: Measured power(i.e. Watt) at specified datetime

get.description: Detailed site energy measurements from meters such as consumption, export (feed-in), import (purchase), etc.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Aggregation granularity, allowed values are QUARTER_OF_AN_HOUR, HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The energy measured start time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format
parameters.x-ms-summary: The energy measured start time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The energy measured end time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format
parameters.x-ms-summary: The energy measured end time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

parameters.name: Meters
parameters.description: Select specific meters only, if blank everything is returned. Allowed values are PRODUCTION, CONSUMPTION, SelfConsumption, FeedIn, Purchased

value.description: Measured power(i.e. Watt) at specified datetime

get.description: Detailed site power measurements from meters such as consumption, export (feed-in), import (purchase), etc.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The energy measured start time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The energy measured end time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

values.description: Pairs of date and power for every date

get.description: Retrieves the current power flow between all elements of the site including PV array, storage (battery), loads (consumption) and grid.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

connections.description: A table including all the relationships between the elements, and the power flow directions (producing element and consuming element)

timeLeft.description: In backup mode, specified time before storage runs out

siteCurrentPowerFlow.description: The response returns power flow for each of the elements in the system and their state

get.description: Return the site total energy produced for a given period.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date to return energy measurement
parameters.x-ms-summary: The start date to return energy measurement

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date return energy measurement
parameters.x-ms-summary: The end date return energy measurement

get.description: Returns for each meter on site its lifetime energy reading, metadata and the device to which it’s connected to.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Aggregation granularity, allowed values are QUARTER_OF_AN_HOUR, HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The energy measured start time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format
parameters.x-ms-summary: The energy measured start time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The energy measured end time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format
parameters.x-ms-summary: The energy measured end time in yyyy-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format

parameters.name: meters
parameters.description: Select specific meters only. If this value is omitted, all meter readings are returned. Allowed values are Production, Consumption, FeedIn, Purchased

connectedSolaredgeDeviceSN.description: Inverter to which the meter is connected to

meterType.description: Meter type Production, Consumption, FeedIn or Purchased

get.description: Get detailed storage information from batteries: the state of energy, power and lifetime energy.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: serials
parameters.description: Return data only for specific battery serial numbers, the list is comma separated. If omitted, the response includes all the batteries in the site
parameters.x-ms-summary: Return data only for specific battery serial numbers

batteryCount.description: Number of batteries includes in the response

nameplate.description: The nameplate (nominal) capacity of the battery

telemetryCount.description: The number of telemetries for this battery in the response

timeStamp.description: Telemetry timestamp in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

power.description: Positive power indicates the battery is charging, negative is discharging

batteryState.description: Can be one of the following 0 (Invalid), 1 (Standby), 2 (Thermal Mgmt.), 3 (Enabled), 4 (Fault)

lifeTimeEnergyCharged.description: The energy Charged from the battery in Wh, during battery lifetime

lifeTimeEnergyDischarged.description: The energy discharged from the battery in Wh, during battery lifetime

fullPackEnergyAvailable.description: The maximum energy (Wh) that can currently be stored in the battery

ACGridCharging.description: Amount of AC energy used to charge the battery from grid within a specified date range in Wh

stateOfCharge.description: the battery state of charge as percentage of the available capacity. Values are in the range of 0 to 100

telemetries.description: A list of storage data telemetries

get.description: Return a list of inverters/SMIs in the specific site

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

get.description: Returns a list of all the sensors in the site, and the device to which they are connected

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

connectedTo.description: Name of the gateway the sensor is connected to

measurement.description: What the sensor measures, e.g. SensorGlobalHorizontalIrradiance, SensorDiffusedIrradiance, SensorAmbientTemperature

type.description: what the sensor measures, e.g. SensorGlobalHorizontalIrradiance, SensorDiffusedIrradiance, SensorAmbientTemperature

get.description: Return specific inverter data for a given timeframe.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: equipment_id
parameters.description: The serial number of the equipment
parameters.x-ms-summary: The serial number of the equipment

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start (date + time) to get inverter data
parameters.x-ms-summary: The start (date + time) to get inverter data

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end (date + time) to get inverter data
parameters.x-ms-summary: The end (date + time) to get inverter data

inverterMode.description: State of the inverter i.e. OFF, STARTING, MPPT etc.

operationMode.description: Operation mode integer 0 On-grid, 1 Operating in off-grid mode with PV or Battery, 2 operating in off-grid mode with generator

get.description: Returns a list of equipment component replacements ordered by date. This method is applicable to inverters, optimizers, batteries and gateways.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The site identifier

parameters.name: equipment_id
parameters.description: The serial number of the equipment
parameters.x-ms-summary: The serial number of the equipment

date.description: Date of replacement of that equipment component
